channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Core Control
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Core Control

item.title: CVE-2022-1760|2024-08-03T00:16:59.995Z -- unknown -- core%20control
item.description: The Core Control WordPress plugin through 1.2.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
